Subscribe:CRYPTO EXEC MOVES about clients Investments Say hi hi@intersectiongp.com MENU We build crypto companies Founded in 2018, we are the leading crypto-native executive search firm. We connect our clients with world-class talent and invest our own capital for true alignment. Clients Intersection has made many of our most impactful hires. They are major investors in Circle, understand our business intimately and outwork their competition, hands down. Jeremy Allaire Co-Founder and CEO, Circle Intersection has been our secret weapon. Theyâve helped us raise the bar, turn over every stone and run meticulous processes as weâve looked for game-changing web3 talent.Â MC Lader Former COO, Uniswap Labs Iâve worked with a lot of recruiters, and Iâve never met anyone like the team at Intersection. They are connected at the most senior levels with crypto investors and operators and they're a pleasure to work with - direct, authentic and non-transactional. Alan Howard Co-Founder, Brevan Howard Intersection helped us fill crucial executive roles at Superstate quickly and with the ideal candidates. They are jet fuel. Robert Leshner CEO at Superstate The team at Intersection are thoughtful and efficient executive search practitioners who are also legit web3 insiders. They have an uncanny ability to ID, engage and recruit game-changing talent in this highly competitive market. Evan Cheng Co-founder & CEO, Mysten Labs I canât imagine a better recruiting partner than Intersection. They have extraordinary connectivity across crypto and, as active investors in the space, understand the tech and operating companies in a unique way. They are communicative, adaptive and provide intelligent counsel without âsellingâ candidates. Avichal Garg Managing Partner, Electric Capital Intersection calibrated quickly, surfaced A+ candidates from around the globe and really felt like an extension of our team. Theyâre not cheap, but they deliver incredible value. Marc Boiron Chief Executive Officer, Polygon Labs Intersection has made many of our most impactful hires. The result? Deep alignment and extraordinary outcomes. say hi The most important crypto people moves, direct to your inbox. THANKS! YOUâRE ON THE LIST. Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form. hi@intersectiongp.com About Clients Investments intersection fintech index By clicking âAccept All Cookiesâ , you agree to the storing of cookies on your device to enhance site navigation, analyze site usage, and assist in our marketing efforts. Deny Accept Preferences Privacy Preference Center When you visit websites, they may store or retrieve data in your browser. This storage is often necessary for the basic functionality of the website. The storage may be used for marketing, analytics, and personalization of the site, such as storing your preferences. Privacy is important to us, so you have the option of disabling certain types of storage that may not be necessary for the basic functioning of the website. Blocking categories may impact your experience on the website. Reject all cookies Allow all cookies Manage Consent Preferences by Category Essential Always Active These items are required to enable basic website functionality. Marketing Essential These items are used to deliver advertising that is more relevant to you and your interests. They may also be used to limit the number of times you see an advertisement and measure the effectiveness of advertising campaigns. Advertising networks usually place them with the website operatorâs permission. Personalization Essential These items allow the website to remember choices you make (such as your user name, language, or the region you are in) and provide enhanced, more personal features. For example, a website may provide you with local weather reports or traffic news by storing data about your current location. Analytics Essential These items help the website operator understand how its website performs, how visitors interact with the site, and whether there may be technical issues. This storage type usually doesnât collect information that identifies a visitor. Confirm my preferences and close

We prioritise your development, wellbeing, and experience every step of the way. Fortnightly Pay We believe in keeping things simple and stress-free. With fortnightly living-wage pay, you get paid faster and more frequently, giving you real financial control. Reward As a proud Living Wage employer, we believe your hard work deserves fair pay. We’re committed to ensuring everyone on our team earns a wage that reflects the value they bring. Development Joining Ethical Staffing means joining a team that invests in your future. From recognised certifications to practical on-the-job skills, we provide the tools you need to grow your career. Aug 17 Car Park Marshalls – Dean Forest Railway 2025 (Wed 16th July – Sun 17th August) No More Applications What roles do you offer? We offer a range of different roles, depending on the needs of our partners. At events , our most common roles include box office, stewarding, hospitality and customer service roles. Our non event roles range from front of house, barista, catering and logistics positions. Have a look at our events pages to see what roles suit your skills, interests and availability best. What sectors do you support? Ethical Staffing work with a hugely diverse range of clients; Conferences, Sporting Events, Brand activations, World Heritage events, University Graduations, and of course, Live Events and Festivals. We are proud to state that our client portfolio is as diverse as our staffing teams! What is the application process? Want to join our superstar team? First you’ll need to fill out an application form on our recruitment portal. Here you can tell us about your experience & what events you’re interested in. One of our recruitment team will then arrange to have a telephone or Zoom interview with you, and if successful we will set you up on our shift allocation system where you will be able to choose any roles that you are interested in working at, and be the first to find out about exciting new openings! Learn more here. Can I work with my friends? Absolutely! The more the merrier! We can’t guarantee that your shifts / roles will align, but we can do our very best to make it work. Please ensure you mention this when you are contacted by our team at HQ to book in your work. What's in it for me? We truly take pride in supporting our your wellbeing and happiness! At an event, this includes free tea and coffee, snacks and around the clock support from our awesome team of managers. For weekend camping events you will also get perks like a free meal ticket for each shift worked, access to a dedicated crew camping area with hot showers, phone charging points and lots more! “Just wanted to say thanks to you and the team for today. I’ve worked with various agencies at events/festivals before and this was by far the most enjoyable experience. You have a really nice team and I felt valued and trusted” - Leanne, ES Crew 2022 "Working with Ethical Staffing has given me confidence and helped build my people skills. I spent the summer working at the most awesome festivals and events in the UK!" - Gary, ES Crew 2022 Services EXPLORE Roles EXPLORE Purpose Driven Staffing Solutions Location Kambe House 34 Portland Square Bristol BS2 8RG Useful Links FAQ’s Meet The Team Privacy Environmental Policy Email Us team@ethicalstaff.co.uk Call Us 0117 462 2579 Ethical Event Staffing LTD.
